code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{getAllAccounts,deleteAccount}from'./api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AccountList(){const[accounts,setAccounts]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{getAllAccounts().then(response=>setAccounts(response.data));},[]);const handleDelete=accountId=>{deleteAccount(accountId).then(()=>setAccounts(accounts.filter(acc=>acc.id!==accountId)));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"All Accounts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:accounts.map(account=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[account.name," - Balance: $",account.balance,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleDelete(account.id),children:"Delete"})]},account.id))})]});}export default AccountList;
